description: Detects the execution of netsh to configure a port forwarding of port 3389 (RDP) rule
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
oscd.community
name: RDP Port Forwarding Rule Added Via Netsh.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\netsh.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"netsh.exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:"*\ i*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ p*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\=3389*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ c*"))
